item.description:
Psyborg:

All fanboys smell like puberty. At least they’re not listening to that rock music and experimenting with sex!

When people say experimenting, I always think of it in a laboratory situation.

“So when we mix 3 parts penis, with 2 parts vagina…”

item.source: microsofts biggest mistake yet. lbp theme in 360 comercial XD

item.title: microsofts biggest mistake yet. lbp theme in 360 comercial XD
item.dc:creator: Dust
item.description:
I think everyone is sort of used to it now. I’m not saying that Microsoft all out copied this song from LBP, but what are the chances of such a rarely head song being used like this twice. Also, the graphic design just looks very similar.

In all fairness though, no one should really care too much, and even 360 fanboys can’t deny that Microsoft do like taking…inspiration…for their ideas.

Read full topic
item.source: microsofts biggest mistake yet. lbp theme in 360 comercial XD

item.title: microsofts biggest mistake yet. lbp theme in 360 comercial XD
item.dc:creator: ulvemann43
item.description:
Crunchy:

I’m not. I don’t own a console…anymore. The point is, only sony fanboys would care that MS is using a song that is used in a Sony exclusive game (the song in question wasn’t even made for LBP btw).

I didn’t say anything about preferring either console. I think they are both fine.

normal people care to as well as both microsoft and sony fanboys. and the comercial reminds me verry much of exactly lbp if i turn the volume off

Read full topic
